text: (ovun kæmati prakara) yamkisi sadhakayak taman venuven lækhena vita “niyata vasayenma api eya visvasa karamu” yayi ovun allah kerehi sthira vu divrumak kara, pavasannaha. (eyata nabiye! oba ovunta) “niyata vasayenma sadhakayan siyalla allahge sannidhanayehima ætteya. (eva ohu kæmati akarayatama ikut karanneya. oba kæmati akarayata nova)” yayi pavasanu mænava! (esema) ovun veta (ovun kæmati prakara) niyata vasayenma eya pæminena vita, eya ovun visvasa karannema næta yanna (visvasavantayini!) oba dannehuda
